last_episode_to_air.name: Take Me Home, Country Roads
last_episode_to_air.overview: In the series finale, Luke opens up about his struggles, Maggie throws one last Christmas party at the bar, and Colt gives Beau a heartwarming gift.

name: The Ranch
overview: Being a pro athlete didn't pan out for Colt. Now he's helping his dad and brother keep the ranch afloat, and figuring out how he fits into the family.

episodes.name: Back Where I Come From
episodes.overview: When Colt Bennett returns home from Canada to try out for a semipro Denver team, he learns that his family's ranch has fallen on hard times.

episodes.name: Some People Change
episodes.overview: Colt runs into an ex at Maggie's bar and reminisces with Rooster over a bottle of whiskey. Getting back in Beau's good graces is a losing battle.

episodes.name: The Boys of Fall
episodes.overview: When his inflated ego lands him in hot water, Colt realizes he's not the big man on campus anymore. Beau's doctor makes him trade in steak for salad.

episodes.name: Got a Little Crazy
episodes.overview: Colt smooths things over with Abby. When Maggie drags Beau to the Marriott for a romantic evening, the guys have some fun back at the house.

episodes.name: American Kids
episodes.overview: Rooster and Colt's long-simmering rivalry comes to a head on the first day of hunting season. But their bickering has an upside for Beau and Maggie.

episodes.name: Better as a Memory
episodes.overview: Abby gets a taste of her own medicine after a hazy night of drinking. Beau warms to the idea of mending fences with Maggie.

episodes.name: I Can't Go There
episodes.overview: Colt figures out what he wants from Heather. A sick calf gives Beau an excuse to avoid dealing with his feelings -- and creates some unexpected bonds.

episodes.name: Til It's Gone
episodes.overview: The ranch's dwindling finances drive a wedge between Beau and the boys, and Colt goes behind his father's back to ask Maggie for help.

episodes.name: There Goes My Life
episodes.overview: Heather sets up Rooster with her sister, but Colt's afraid he'll ruin a good thing. Maggie and Beau air their dirty laundry at marriage counseling.

episodes.name: Down the Road
episodes.overview: Colt and Rooster worry when Beau has a change of heart about the calves. But that's just the beginning of the surprises that await the Bennett clan.

episodes.name: Gone as a Girl Can Get
episodes.overview: An angry Beau clears Maggie's things out of the house. Colt tries to sort out his feelings for Abby and Heather.

episodes.name: Living and Living Well
episodes.overview: Colt struggles to keep his relationship with Abby under wraps. The boys make a big purchase and try to sell Beau on a business opportunity.

episodes.name: Sittin' on the Fence
episodes.overview: Beau's depressed over Maggie, so Mary tries to fix him up with a friend. Colt wonders when Abby's going to follow through on her promise.

episodes.name: Let's Fall to Pieces Together
episodes.overview: While Rooster tries to broker peace between Beau and Maggie, Colt apologizes to Heather -- but his timing couldn't be worse.

episodes.name: I Know She Still Loves Me
episodes.overview: Beau and Maggie come to a decision about their relationship, but they don't see eye to eye about the ranch. The boys take Kenny out drinking.

episodes.name: Easy Come, Easy Go
episodes.overview: Rooster and Colt try to prove themselves to Beau, but he doesn't have much faith in them. Colt gets jealous when he sees Abby and Kenny together.

episodes.name: I've Come to Expect It from You
episodes.overview: Colt plans a special date with Abby. Rooster vents his frustrations to Maggie, while Joanne gives Beau some sage advice.

episodes.name: The Cowboy Rides Away
episodes.overview: Beau tries to make amends with the boys, but it may be too little, too late. A job offer drives a wedge between Rooster and Colt.

episodes.name: Leavin's Been Comin' (For a Long, Long Time)
episodes.overview: Maggie stands up for Rooster when Beau kicks him out of the house. Meanwhile, Colt is torn between his brother and his father.

episodes.name: Merry Christmas (Wherever You Are)
episodes.overview: Colt realizes what he wants for his future, Beau and Maggie find some closure, and the gang celebrates Christmas at the bar.

episodes.name: My Next Thirty Years
episodes.overview: After Heather drops a bombshell, a visit from Abby's parents is the last thing Colt needs -- and they all end up at church together on Christmas Eve.

episodes.name: Things Change
episodes.overview: Heather makes a decision about the pregnancy. Mary reads Rooster the riot act for keeping it a secret, and Colt struggles with how to tell Abby.

episodes.name: Take Me Away from Here
episodes.overview: After a heart-to-heart with Maggie, Colt steps up and supports Heather. Meanwhile, the tension between Rooster and Beau takes a toll on Maggie.

episodes.name: She'll Have You Back
episodes.overview: Abby agrees to give Colt a chance, but her father isn't as forgiving. Beau and Rooster go to a cattle auction. Maggie thinks about selling the bar.

episodes.name: My Best Friend
episodes.overview: The guys wind up in hot water after an ice fishing trip. Beau takes Brenda out to dinner, but Maggie's not far from his mind.

episodes.name: Find Out Who Your Friends Are
episodes.overview: Emotions run high when Abby and Heather fight, leaving Colt caught in the middle. Rooster faces the consequences of blowing off work.

episodes.name: One of Those Nights
episodes.overview: During a snowstorm, Colt and Abby head out of town, Beau and Joanne get cozy at the ranch, and Maggie meets a charming stranger.

episodes.name: I Didn't Ask and She Didn't Say
episodes.overview: Colt gets possessive when Heather starts dating a teacher. Abby gives Beau relationship advice. Maggie has a business proposition for Rooster

episodes.name: Last Dollar (Fly Away)
episodes.overview: As Heather's medical bills roll in, Colt realizes how expensive it is having a baby. A surprise visitor at the bar sweeps Maggie off her feet.

episodes.name: Can't Be Really Gone
episodes.overview: Colt's new responsibilities keep him away from Abby. After a memorable night, Maggie ponders what she wants for her future.

episodes.name: Learning to Live Again
episodes.overview: Colt wants to buy Sam Peterson's ranch -- with or without his family's blessing. Colt and Heather have a heart-to-heart about their loss.

episodes.name: Wrapped Up in You
episodes.overview: Wondering if he's ready to marry Abby, Colt seeks romantic advice from an unlikely source: Beau. Rooster hires a flaky new waitress.

episodes.name: Rodeo and Juliet
episodes.overview: Beau ponders a lucrative business offer. Rooster runs afoul of the liquor board. Colt tries to make peace with Abby's dad.

episodes.name: Much Too Young (To Feel This Damn Old)
episodes.overview: Colt and Abby start planning their wedding, but they don't see eye to eye. Joanne confesses she still has feelings for Beau.

episodes.name: More Than a Memory
episodes.overview: Abby moves in with Colt and Beau when she learns she’s losing her job. Rooster and Jen the engineer bond over getting dumped.

episodes.name: When You Come Back to Me Again
episodes.overview: Back in town, Maggie frets about how Rooster's been running the bar. Abby considers a career change.

episodes.name: Do What You Gotta Do
episodes.overview: A job opportunity in Denver threatens to drive a wedge between Colt and Abby. Maggie pushes back about the pipeline.

episodes.name: Big Money
episodes.overview: Maggie takes a stand that lands her in hot water. Colt and Rooster come up with a plan to buy the Peterson ranch, but they need Beau's buy-in.

episodes.name: Ain't Goin' Down ('Til the Sun Comes Up)
episodes.overview: Beau shrugs off the doctor's orders and resists the family's efforts to help him. Meanwhile, Colt lashes out at Maggie.

episodes.name: If Tomorrow Never Comes
episodes.overview: Beau leaves the boys hanging about the Peterson ranch. Rooster takes Jen on a date. Colt and Abby fight about their future.

episodes.name: Starting Over Again
episodes.overview: In the wake of his heart attack, Beau vows to stop sweating the small stuff -- but Colt and Rooster's latest blunder makes him lose his cool.

episodes.name: It's All Wrong, But It's All Right
episodes.overview: Maggie fights to keep the ranch afloat as she reaches a breaking point with the boys. Easter dinner with Abby's parents takes a surprising turn.

episodes.name: A Gamble Either Way
episodes.overview: Torn between the ranch and a job opportunity, Colt wonders what's best for his family's future. Mary offers to work at Maggie's bar.

episodes.name: Baby I'm Burning
episodes.overview: Four months later, wildfires rage in Colorado. Abby wants to postpone the wedding, but her parents don't approve. Joanne stands up to a stubborn Beau.

episodes.name: Travelin' Prayer
episodes.overview: Fires force the town to evacuate. While Maggie takes charge, Beau feels hopeless. Colt runs into Heather, and Rooster meets Mary's boyfriend, Nick.

episodes.name: Tie Our Love (In a Double Knot)
episodes.overview: Colt and Mr. Phillips search for Abby. Heather warns Rooster about Nick. An unexpected celebration brings everyone together.

episodes.name: Telling Me Lies
episodes.overview: The Bennetts return to the ranch. Beau gets a business proposition from Neumann's Hill. A face from Maggie's past arrives with news.

episodes.name: Fresh Out of Forgiveness
episodes.overview: When Colt lands in trouble covering for Rooster, he tries to cash in a favor. Beau invites Joanne to stay at the ranch. Colt plans a surprise for Abby.

episodes.name: It Ain't Fair that It Ain't Right
episodes.overview: Beau's at the end of his rope and decides to teach Colt and Rooster a lesson. Mary realizes she needs to choose between Rooster and Nick.

episodes.name: Change
episodes.overview: Nick confronts Rooster. Running out of options, Colt reaches out to Lisa Neumann. Joanne urges Beau to make peace with Colt.

episodes.name: When It All Goes South
episodes.overview: While Abby's in Denver teaching, Colt works to rebuild the Peterson ranch. Rooster misses his first day of work.

episodes.name: Reckless
episodes.overview: After a fight with Nick lands Colt in hot water, Mary presses her ex for the truth. Beau delivers troubling news.

episodes.name: If I Could Just See You Now
episodes.overview: Beau intervenes to keep Colt out of trouble. Abby and Colt follow a lead. Maggie returns to Garrison, and Mary wrestles with guilt.

episodes.name: Changes Comin' on
episodes.overview: One month later, tensions run high as Colt and Abby scramble to get ready for the baby. Lisa Neumann makes Beau an offer.

episodes.name: Born Country
episodes.overview: Colt tries to keep his cool as he worries about Abby -- and wonders if he's ready to be a dad. Maggie catches Mary in a lie.

episodes.name: Pass It on Down
episodes.overview: While Abby and Colt struggle with parenting an infant, another new arrival shakes things up at the ranch. Maggie confronts Mary.

episodes.name: Give Me One More Shot
episodes.overview: Beau's softer side emerges when he takes Luke under his wing, but Colt doesn't trust his cousin. Maggie comforts an exhausted Abby.

episodes.name: Keep on Dreamin'
episodes.overview: Money troubles put a strain on Colt and Abby's relationship. Beau tries to get Luke help for his PTSD but refuses to bail Colt out of a jam.

episodes.name: Down This Road
episodes.overview: Colt hides the truth from Abby as their financial woes go from bad to worse. A drunken night leads to an awkward morning after for Mary.

episodes.name: We Can't Love Like This Anymore
episodes.overview: Beau issues Luke an ultimatum. As Colt tries to prove himself to Abby, Luke makes him an offer -- but Mary drives a wedge between them.

episodes.name: Dying to See Her
episodes.overview: Abby asks Colt for space, but he finds every excuse in the book to drop by. Luke and Mary tie the knot in Vegas. Lisa Neumann accuses Colt of theft.

episodes.name: I Wish You'd Stay
episodes.overview: Back in Colorado, Luke works to win back Colt and Beau's trust. Abby invites Colt to a teachers' mixer. Mary struggles to stay clean.

episodes.name: Waitin' on a Woman
episodes.overview: Beau gives Colt a taste of his own medicine. Mary asks Luke for help paying the mortgage. Colt confronts Abby about not getting to see Peyton.

episodes.name: Remind Me
episodes.overview: Joanne shares difficult news with Beau. Abby helps Colt with a business idea. When Mary goes missing, Heather takes drastic measures.

episodes.name: Love and War
episodes.overview: Out on bail, Mary breaks into her old house to grab her stash. After a talk with Dale, Joanne has a change of heart. Colt and Beau confront Lisa.

episodes.name: The Devil Is Alive and Well
episodes.overview: At Colt and Luke's encouragement, Beau and Joanne plan a celebration. Abby asks Colt to go to counseling. Mary's downward spiral continues.

episodes.name: Last Time for Everything
episodes.overview: Colt asks Abby to lie to the police. Joanne and Beau have a heart-wrenching talk about the future. Mary tells Luke she wants to go to rehab.

episodes.name: Without a Fight
episodes.overview: Abby and Beau pressure Colt to take Lisa's deal, but support from the local ranchers leads him to waver. Stress causes Luke to lash out.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Future
episodes.overview: Colt tries to round up the other ranchers to give Neumann's Hill some competition. After another argument with Abby, Colt signs the divorce papers.

episodes.name: Perfect Storm
episodes.overview: Colt, Beau and Luke bond during a road trip to New Mexico. Back home, Abby runs into Mary and Nick.

episodes.name: It Ain't My Fault
episodes.overview: Luke, Colt and Beau find Mary in bad shape in Nick's trailer. While Luke brings Mary back to the ranch, Colt and Beau wait for Nick.

episodes.name: Like It's the Last Time
episodes.overview: To celebrate their last Thanksgiving on the ranch, Colt and the guys go on a turkey hunt. Mary checks into rehab.

episodes.name: Out of Sight
episodes.overview: Abby invites Colt out for a birthday dinner ... which might be a date. But the plan goes off the rails after Colt has an argument with Luke.

episodes.name: Fadeaway
episodes.overview: As Colt battles the elements, he leaves Abby a poignant message. Armed with a new perspective, Beau surprises Joanne.

episodes.name: Born to Love You
episodes.overview: Colt finally wins back Abby's trust -- but he's afraid to tell her he knows who killed Nick. Beau and Joanne look for a house together.

episodes.name: Not Everything's About You
episodes.overview: Maggie returns from Florida with news. When Dale uncovers a problem with the herd, Colt weighs whether to tell Lisa Neumann.

episodes.name: What Was I Thinking
episodes.overview: Luke urges Mary to go back to rehab. The police find a gun near the trailer and make an arrest, leaving Colt struggling with his conscience.

episodes.name: Helluva Life
episodes.overview: Luke's friend from the service offers him a job. Meanwhile, trouble brews with the co-op. Maggie tells Beau that she's met someone new.

episodes.name: Dumb Effin' Luck
episodes.overview: Jerry warns Colt that Lisa Neumann has a good case against him. And when Luke bails on work, Colt has to miss Peyton's baptism.

episodes.name: Take Me Home, Country Roads
episodes.overview: In the series finale, Luke opens up about his struggles, Maggie throws one last Christmas party at the bar, and Colt gives Beau a heartwarming gift.
